hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Whoever has eaten garlic or onion should keep away from us (or should keep away from our mosque)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ الثُّومِ وَالْبُقُولِ
chapter.eng-name: The eating of garlic or other (bad smelling vegetables).
